title: Monster Energy: Shoot
excerpt: Monster Energy riders prep for A1.
author: Lewis Phillips
content:
Subscribe to MX Vice on YouTube.

Follow @MXVice on Instagram.

After months of preparation both in the gym and on the track, the time has come for a new racing season to begin. For any motorsports fan, each New Year celebration also brings along a heightened sense of anticipation, knowing that in a matter of days the fearless superstars of Monster Energy Supercross will storm out the gate and soar through the air to start a 17-round journey to crown a trio of champions. – Monster Energy

Video: Monster Energy | Lead Image: Yamaha Racing
